IN.IC: v tem slovarju pa besedi obravnavamo ločeno.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
might happen
, to pomeni, da je možno, da se bo zgodilo. Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
might be true
, to pomeni, da je morda resnično.

seg.quote: I might even lose my job.
I might go to a concert tonight.
Don't eat it. It might be a toadstool.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
might have happened
, pomeni, da je možno, da se je to zgodilo.

seg.quote: He might well have said that. I just don't remember.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
might have happened
, to lahko pomeni tudi, da je bilo mogoče, da bi se to zgodilo, v resnici pa se ni.

seg.quote: A lot of men died who might have been saved.

sense.def:
Besedo
might
lahko uporabljamo v zelo vljudnih ali uradnih prošnjah.

seg.quote: Might I inquire if you are the owner?
She asked the man's wife if she might borrow a pen.

sense.def:
Prav tako lahko
might
uporabimo, če hočemo nekaj predlagati.

seg.quote: The other thing you might find out is who owns the land.
I tied the rope around the tree and heaved with all my might.
